name: Slash N Dash
description:
Take control of a katana-wielding, comic-store-avenging, fedora-wearing Chad Slayer in this game created for the ICT Winter Game Jam. Survive against waves of enemies with unique attacks to activate both positive and negative modifiers that change the game; avoid taking damage to maintain your multiplier; compete to get the highest score!

Created by Bolo Chavez, Colton Pfannenstiel, and Jack Hale.
